text: @UkraineEnergySector #Ukraine #EnergySector #RussiaIt's been 10 years since the war started, and it's high time to assess the impact on Ukraine's energy sector. While Russia's threats haven't disappeared, Ukraine has made significant strides in strengthening its energy security & achieving transparency in the sector. ðŸ’¡We've come a long way since 2014, adopting European-aligned laws & eliminating subsidies for households.
